text: Lucienne Moreau (17 February 1933 – 16 January 2022) was a French actress. She was most well known for her appearances on Groland and Le Petit Journal on Canal+. Moreau was born in Renazé, France. She also appeared in the movies Who Killed Bambi? (2003) and Rolling to You (2018). Moreau died on 16 January 2022 in Paris, France at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors
title: Lucienne Moreau
